== Perumanna (CT) (627528) ==

Perumanna (CT) is a town in the [[Tirur]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 11.88 sq. km. and harbouring 4939 households with total population of 27278 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Malappuram]] is at a distance of 18 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 360 km. Male population is 12702 and female population is 14576. Scheduled Caste population is 576 and Scheduled Tribes population is 100. Census Location Code of the town is 627528<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Malappuram (m + og) at a distance of 18 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 68 km. Railway station is at Tirur at a distance of 9 km.
